basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Talented Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, and maintaining web-based applications using JavaScript frameworks including Vue.js, React.js, and Node.js. Proven track record in front-end and back-end integration, agile collaboration with cross-functional teams, and ensuring responsive performance and secure data handling. Committed to delivering high-performance, scalable applications through modern development practices, code optimization, and tools like Git, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines.
